MJD[source]

MJD(met)

convert MET to MJD

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

UTC[source]

UTC(mjd)

convert MJD value to ISO date string

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert UTC(MJD(0))=='2001-01-01 00:01'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Config[source]

Config(verbose:int=3, mjd_range:Tuple=None, cos_theta_max:float=0.5, z_max:float=100, bins_per_decade:int=4, base_spectrum:str='lambda E: (E/1000)**-2.1', energy_range:Tuple=(100.0, 1000000.0))

Config(verbose: int = 3, mjd_range: Tuple = None, cos_theta_max: float = 0.5, z_max: float = 100, bins_per_decade: int = 4, base_spectrum: str = 'lambda E: (E/1000)**-2.1', energy_range: Tuple = (100.0, 1000000.0))

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FileConfiguration[source]

FileConfiguration(data:str='$HOME/work/lat-data/binned', ft2:str=`'$HOME/work/lat-data/ft2/.fits'*, **gti**:str=*'$HOME/work/lat-data/binned/*.fits'`*, **`aeff`**:`str`=*`'$HOME/work/lat-data/aeff'`*)

FileConfiguration(data: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/binned', ft2: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/ft2/.fits', gti: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/binned/.fits', aeff: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/aeff')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PointSource[source]

PointSource(name, position=None)

Manage the position and name of a point source

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for s, expect in [( PointSource('Geminga'),             'Source "Geminga" at: (l,b)=(195.134,4.266)'),
                  ( PointSource('gal_source', (0,0)),   'Source "gal_source" at: (l,b)=(0.000,0.000)', ),
                  ( PointSource.fk5('fk5_source',(0,0)),'Source "fk5_source" at: (l,b)=(96.337,-60.189)',)
                   ]:    
    assert str(s)==expect, f'expected {expect}, got {str(s)}'

98.4756444012808 17.770246940026677
266.4049962340225 -28.936172403391776
0.0 3.1805546814635168e-15
{% endraw %}
